revised_title: November 21, 1878: Royal Society Presentations and Publications
tldr: This article presents a list of books and publications related to the Royal Society, including a guide to autograph letters, a catalogue of the library, and a book about the Seleucid Kings of Syria. It also mentions Dr. Charles Beke's discoveries of Sinai in Arabia and Midian.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Library Science and Book Reviews
